attributes.action: Stop the banning of the XL bully breed - So many are against it
attributes.additional_details: The dogs themselves are not the problem. A whole dog breed cannot be abolished for a few. They are a kind breed and it is cruel to their owners and them to kill XL bullies. It is not too late to revoke the banning. Please do something, owners are in deep upset and even those who do not own bullies are unsettled by this decision, the number of petitions shows this. It is not what society is used to and has caused genuine upset.
attributes.background: Stop the banning of the xl bully dog breed. Do not kill them, it is unfair and inhumane. Alternative solutions can be found and animal abuse should be investigated and punished more harshly.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for a similar action:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611

Delay the ban on rehoming and owning XL Bully dogs for 18 months: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/650474

Review and reform arrangements for ban on XL Bully type dogs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652260
